---
Song: enadhuyirE
Film: Bheema
---
Notes: s r2 g2 m1 p d1 n2 S

enadhuyirE enadhuyirE enakkenavE nee kidaiTHAi 
pd n  S S  nS d  p pS nS  d p p  mp  d p  p

enadhuravE enadhuravE kadavuLaippOl nee muLaiTHAi 
pd n  S S  nS d  p pS nSnSd p   p   mp  d p  p

nedunjAlayil padum pAdhampOl sErgirEn vAzhum kAlamE 
S R  RGR S   n S   SRS   n   d  d d   S G    RSS SR

varum nAtkaLE tharum pookkaLE neeLumE kAdhal kAdhal vAsamE 
S R   RG R S  n  S   SR  S n  d  d d  Sn d   Sn d   Snm p

(enadhuyirE)

Stanza 1:

ini iravE illai kaNdEn un vizhigaLil kizhakku dhisai 
gm  mp p  m p   n  np  pm m p  p n   n S   S  n  n

ini pirivE illai anbE un uLaralum enakku isai 
gm  m p p  m p   n np pm mp p n   nS  S  nn

unnai kANum varayil enadhu vAzhkkai veLLai kAgidham 
pS SG G G   R R G   GG G   R    G   M  G   R S SR

kaNNAl neeyum adhilE ezhudhi pOnAi nalla Oviyam 
p npG  G  G   RR  G  GG  G   R G   M  G  RS R

siru pAraiyil oru vArTHayil thOndrudhE nooru kOdi vAnavil 
S R  RGR  S   nS  SR S  n   d    d d   Sn d  Sn d Snm p

(enadhuyirE)

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)

maram irundhAl angE enai nizhal ena viriTHiduvEn 
ilai vizhundhAl iyO endrE nAn irudhayam thudiTHiduvEn 
inimEl namadhu idhazhgaL iNaindhu sirikkum Osai kEttkumE 
nedunAL nilavum nilavin kaLangam thudaikka kaigaL kOrkkumE 
uruvAkkinAi adhikAlayai AgavE nee en vAzhvin mOtCHamE 

(enadhuyirE)
